content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE raw_data.vtex_details (
	[orderId] varchar(8000),
	[uniqueId] varchar(8000),
	[IdItem] varchar(8000),
	[productId] varchar(8000),
	[ean] varchar(8000),
	[lockId] varchar(8000),
	[quantity] varchar(8000),
	[seller] varchar(8000),
	[nameItem] varchar(8000),
	[refId] varchar(8000),
	[price] varchar(8000),
	[listPrice] varchar(8000),
	[imageUrl] varchar(8000),
	[brandName] varchar(8000),
	[brandId] varchar(8000),
	[categoriesIds] varchar(8000),
	[IdCategory] varchar(8000),
	[nameCategory] varchar(8000),
	[email] varchar(8000),
	[firstName] varchar(8000),
	[lastName] varchar(8000),
	[documentType] varchar(8000),
	[document] varchar(8000),
	[phone] varchar(8000),
	[addressType] varchar(8000),
	[receiverName] varchar(8000),
	[addressId] varchar(8000),
	[postalCode] varchar(8000),
	[city] varchar(8000),
	[state] varchar(8000),
	[country] varchar(8000),
	[street] varchar(8000),
	[number] varchar(8000),
	[neighborhood] varchar(8000),
	[complement] varchar(8000),
	[reference] varchar(8000),
	[geoCoordinates] varchar(8000),
	[itemIndex] varchar(8000),
	[selectedSla] varchar(8000),
	[lockTTL] varchar(8000),
	[priceLogistics] varchar(8000),
	[listPriceLogistics] varchar(8000),
	[sellingPrice] varchar(8000),
	[deliveryWindow] varchar(8000),
	[deliveryCompany] varchar(8000),
	[shippingEstimate] varchar(8000),
	[shippingEstimateDate] varchar(8000),
	[deliveryChannel] varchar(8000),
	[paymentSystem] varchar(8000),
	[paymentSystemName] varchar(8000),
	[value] varchar(8000),
	[installments] varchar(8000),
	[referenceValue] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/vtex/OrderDetails.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
